Description: model type of the Interbotix Arm such as 'wx200' or 'rx150'
name of the robot (typically equal to robot_model, but could be anything)
name of the 'root' link on the arm; typically 'base_link', but can be changed if attaching the arm to a mobile base that already has a 'base_link' frame
the file path to the 'mode config' YAML file
the outputted command from the control loop - can be either 'pwm' or 'current'
the file path to the 'gains' YAML file
true if the xsarm_control.launch file should be launched - set to false if you would like to run your own version of this file separately
